comment: Attendance is not madatory, but if you show up for lectures sometimes he will give extra credit. Semester consisted of online homework and 4 tests. Lowest test grade was dropped. All chapters are typed as notes and posted on D2L. Easy A, if you study the notes and do the homework.
It's his first year teaching and you can tell. He blows by powerpoints and his lectures are boring. Mastering isn't that bad but his tests are another language. Just not a good teacher
